caption.title: The mean reduction in prevalence (y-axis) in scenario 3 ( α = 0.8, ϕ = 0.4 and η = 0.6) for interventions of various size(x-axis) across the different target processes, green circles for interventions in Radiation ( α), blue triangles for interventions in transmission ( ϕ), and gray pluses for interventions in reception ( η).
